function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential security breaches in blockchain technology leading to unauthorized access to patient data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete data collection from blockchain participating nodes.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Blockchain technology deployment challenges and integration complexities within healthcare systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","category":"Technological risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public transportation has been severely affected during the pandemic, leading to increased use of private vehicles as a safer alternative and potentially posing threats to achieving sustainable development.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence on the effects of urban design on covid-19 spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debate on the link between covid-19 prevalence and urban design characteristics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Advocacy for compact urban development without clear evidence on its impact on disease spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in high-density areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in certain phases of the epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings on the influence of urban form and design on pandemic dynamics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the relationship between population density and covid-19 spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative attitudes towards public transport may persist, leading to decreased usage and increased reliance on private vehicles.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased investment in suburban developments and reliance risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and monitoring of the population leading to unchecked spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accessibility and affordability issues with smart solutions leading to digital divide","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart technologies
